metro.GameScreen.MainView.TrainView

Class TrainViewBuy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen
        • metro.GameScreen.MainView.TrainView.TrainViewBuy

  • public class TrainViewBuy
extends GameScreen
    A part of the TrainView where the user can buy new trains. It will also show information about different train types but this tool can't edit the trains per line. The player can only buy trains with this dialog but can't sell any trains.
    Author:
    hauke

      • setTrain

        public void setTrain(java.lang.String modelName)
        Changes the selected train in the list to the given one. This will also update the information list. When the model doesn't exist, nothing changes.
        Parameters:
        modelName - The model name of the selection.
